name: pull_request_assigned_to_me
description: Search pull requests where you are the assignee, author, or reviewer

azure_project.description: Optionally set the Azure DevOps project name of the pull request. Required for Azure DevOps

is_closed.description: Set to true if you want to search for closed pull requests

page.description: Optional parameter to specify the page number, defaults to 1

repository_name.description: Set the repository name of the pull request. Required for Azure DevOps and Bitbucket

repository_organization.description: Set the organization name of the pull request. Required for Azure DevOps and Bitbucket
